pkgmetadata.longdescription: Point Density for Geospatial Data // The function pointdensity returns a density count and the temporal average for every point in the original list. The dataframe returned includes four columns: lat, lon, count, and date_avg. The "lat" column is the original latitude data; the "lon" column is the original longitude data; the "count" is the density count of the number of points within a radius of radius*grid_size (the neighborhood); and the date_avg column includes the average date of each point in the neighborhood.
